trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Rear floor)

and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Rear frame upper stiffener B and rear frame B)

item.ptxt: Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)
This section explains the procedures after removal of all related parts. For the related parts' removal procedure, refer to the appropriate Shop Manual.
The component replacement procedure described here is only for new Honda-supplied parts, as needed, according to the area and the degree of damage on the body.
Remove the rear floor, and replace it.
Check the rear frame upper stiffener and the rear frame positions for damage. If necessary, replace rear frame upper stiffener B, the rear floor side panel, and rear frame B.
